alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 7:27PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Duval County through 800 PM EDT... At 726 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Craig Field, or near Arlington, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds near 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Unf, Arlington, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, Mayport, Craig Field, San Pablo, Fort Caroline and San Marco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern Florida.
